controller

Interface MoverController<T extends Mover>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCharacterController, PlayerController, SuperZombieController, ZombieController

    public interface MoverController<T extends Mover>
extends GameController

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkCollision(Move moveToCheck) 
      void idle()
      Set the character to idle
      void moveDown()
      If 'S' or down arrow is pressed, orient the character facing down.
      void moveDownLeft()
      If 'down' and 'left' are pressed at the same time, orient the character down and left.
      void moveDownRight()
      If 'down' and 'right' are pressed at the same time, orient the character down and right
      void moveLeft()
      If 'A' or left arrow is pressed, orient the character facing left
      void moveRight()
      If 'D' or right arrow is pressed, orient the character facing right
      void moveUp()
      If 'W' or up arrow is pressed, orient the character facing up.
      void moveUpLeft()
      If 'up' and 'left' are pressed at the same time, orient the character up and left
      void moveUpRight()
      If 'up' and 'right' are pressed at the same time, orient the character up and right
      void resting()
      If the player is not moving..
      void run()
      If 'R' is pressed, player's speed is updated to 2.0, making them two times faster.
      void stopMoving()
      If two incompatible directions are pressed; or stop moving the character
      void walk()
      When 'R' is released, player's speed drops back down to 1.0, the default speed.

        render, update
